entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:14 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:14 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:14 PM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
